metadata.title: CVE-2022-23824 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: IBPB may not prevent return branch predictions from being specified bypre-IBPB branch targets leading to a potential information disclosure.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
